pathfinder.title: Pathfinder
pathfinder.description: Visualize graph algorithms like Dijkstra, BFS, and DFS. Use weighted or unweighted graphs to compare behavior and performance.
pathfinder.details: Run interactive demos to see how nodes are explored and shortest paths are constructed.

recursion-tree.title: Recursion Tree
recursion-tree.description: Shows the recursion tree for common recursive algorithms (Fibonacci, nCr, derangement, etc.).
recursion-tree.details: Inspect how calls expand and collapse, and how values are computed at each node.

sorting.title: Sorting Algorithm
sorting.description: Compare different sorting algorithms visually to learn how they operate and their performance characteristics.
sorting.details: Try Bubble, Selection, Insertion and Quick Sort with adjustable array sizes and speed.

n-queen.title: N Queen
n-queen.description: Solve the N-Queens puzzle: place N queens so no two attack each other.
n-queen.details: Step through backtracking and visualize placements and backtracks.

prime-numbers.title: Prime Numbers
prime-numbers.description: Visualize prime-finding algorithms and compare sieve vs brute force approaches.
prime-numbers.details: See how sieving eliminates multiples efficiently across ranges.

convex-hull.title: Convex Hull
convex-hull.description: Visualize algorithms that compute the convex hull of a set of points.
convex-hull.details: Watch Graham scan and Jarvis march build the hull step by step.

binary-search.title: Binary Search
binary-search.description: Efficiently find items in a sorted list using divide-and-conquer.
binary-search.details: Visualize the search interval shrinking until the target is found.
